alert.note: Alert for Carbon; Monroe (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 21 at 3:10PM EST until February 23 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM WEDNESDAY TO 1 AM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation is expected. Total snow and sleet accumulations of up to one inch. Ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...The Pennsylvania counties of Carbon and Monroe. * WHEN...From 10:00 AM Wednesday until 1:00 AM Thursday. * IMPACTS...Expect slippery conditions on area roads and walkways. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Any impactful ice accumulations are expected to be confined mainly to locations above 1000 feet in elevation.
info.instruction: Slow down and use extra caution if driving. The latest road conditions for your state can be obtained by dialing 5 1 1.
